item.title: Whale Regbil participated in the pump.fun public sale and made a profit of $2.85 million, and had also participated in the XPL public sale.
item.description: August 13th. As per the monitoring by lookonchain, the Whale Address Regbil utilized 6 million USDC through 6 wallets to acquire 1.5 billion PUMP during the public sale on pump.fun. Subsequently, before the price decline, it sold all at 0.0059 USDC, thereby locking in a profit of $2.85 million.Regbil also made a deposit of $11.1 million into Plasma 2 months ago and spent $571,800 to participate in the XPL public sale.

item.title: WCT Surges Over 10% in Short Time, Market Cap Reaches $62 Million
item.description: On August 13th. Possibly because of the "Coinbase to Add WCT to Asset Listing Roadmap" news, WCT witnessed a short-term surge of more than 10%, and its market capitalization reached $62 million.

item.title: Andrew Tate has once again increased his position in Block, now holding a total of $150,000 worth of Block.
item.description: On August 13th, as per the monitoring of lookonchain, Andrew Tate, a KOL with tens of millions of fans on the X platform, has made a third increase in his holdings of Block. He spent 2.22 ETH (approximately $10,000) to purchase 43,349 Block tokens.In general, Andrew Tate has now spent 32.8 ETH (about $127,000) to acquire 662,682 Block tokens (currently valued at around $150,000), with a current unrealized profit of approximately $23,000.

item.title: Coinbase to Add WCT to Asset Listing Roadmap
item.description: On August 13th, Coinbase declared the inclusion of the WalletConnect Token (WCT) in its asset listing roadmap.

item.title: Whale @RegbilTrades Banks $2.85M Profit from $PUMP, Selling Before Price Drop
item.description: Whale @RegbilTrades spent 6M $USDC to buy 1.5B $PUMP in the public sale via 6 wallets â€” and smartly sold all of it at $0.0059 before the drop, locking in a $2.85M profit. @RegbilTrades also deposited $11.1M into Plasma(@PlasmaFDN) 2 months ago and spent $571.8K to join the $XPL public sale.

item.title: Andrew Tate(@Cobratate) just aped into $Block for the third time, spending 2.22 $ETH($10K) to buy 43,349 $Block.
item.description: Andrew Tate(@Cobratate) just aped into $Block for the third time, spending 2.22 $ETH($10K) to buy 43,349 $Block. In total, Andrew Tate spent 32.8 $ETH($127K) to buy 662,682 $Block($150K now), with an unrealized profit of $23K.

item.title: US Stock ProPhase Labs Surges Over 35%, Market Cap Reaches $15.78 Million
item.description: On August 13th, according to data from Rockflow (https://rockflow.ai/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats), the U.S. medical technology company ProPhase Labs saw an intraday surge of over 35%, with its market value rising to $15.78 million. It had previously witnessed a pre-market trading surge of over 40%.ProPhase Labs announced on July 21st that it is conducting a reverse merger with a cryptocurrency-focused company and will commence holding Bitcoin as part of its new digital asset reserve strategy.

item.title: ETHZilla's price surges by 165%, reaching a market cap of $53 million
item.description: On August 13th, according to data from Rockflow (accessible via https://rockflow.ai/en/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats and targeted to _blank), the US stock's new ETH treasury company, ETHZilla, witnessed a significant expansion in the surge of its price by 165%, resulting in a market value reaching $53 million.Before this piece of news, billionaire Peter Thiel once again took a stance in Ethereum. Peter Thiel and his investment team acquired a 7.5% stake in the Ethereum treasury reserve company ETHZilla (formerly known as 180 Life Sciences Corp.).

item.title: White House: Trump is Considering Suing Powell
item.description: On August 13th, White House spokesperson Levitt stated on Tuesday that U.S. President Trump is contemplating suing Federal Reserve Chairman Powell due to Powell's management of the renovation of the Fed's Washington headquarters. President Trump had previously posted on social media regarding this potential action, heightening Trump's continuous pressure on Powell for interest rate cuts. (FXStreet)

item.title: Ethereum Breaks $4500, Sets New All-Time High in Current Bull Run
item.description: On August 13th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum exceeded $4500 and reached a new high in this bull market cycle, with a 24-hour increase of 4.76%.
